text: @realDonaldTrump Hey Idiot and @VP . USE YOUR HEAD! You have to find the cases to stop the spread, you had it wrong from the start, we all saw this. Blue States on decline have tested 160k per 1M pop. 16% Red's, 80k per 1M pop. 8%. SEE???https://t.co/2AIFB8IUwR https://t.co/5Aj11KF7ao
